snippet: Lewis Hamilton beat his Mercedes teammate Nico Rosberg after an intense battle throughout the race to take victory at the Bahrain Grand Prix. Sergio Perez of Force India was third.
abstract: Lewis Hamilton wins Bahrain Grand Prix; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton beat his Mercedes teammate Nico Rosberg after an intense battle throughout the race to take victory at the Bahrain Grand Prix. Sergio Perez of Force India was third.

headline.main: Mercedes Team Finishes One-Two in Bahrain
headline.print_headline: Mercedes Team Finishes One-Two in Bahrain
